column2: "Emi nye nyimpa a mehu amandze wɔ n’ebufuw abaa no ano."
"Ɔapam me dze me kɔ sum mu mbrɛ kan biara nnyi."
"Emi mara nko mo do na ɔdandan ne nsa
column3: ɔdze tsia me adzekyee nyina."

column2: "Ɔama mo honam na mo wer ayɛ dadaw; oebubu me mbiew."
"Ɔatow esiw me kwan
column3: na ɔdze bɔwema na ɔyaw etwa mo ho ehyia."

column2: "Ɔama matsena mbea a ɔyɛ sum mu
column3: dɛ hɔn a woewuwu akyɛr."

column2: "Ɔagye mo ho ban
column3: na munntum mummpue; ɔama mo nkɔnsɔnkɔnsɔn no ayɛ dur."

column2: "Kaansa musu frɛ mboa mpo a
column3: osiw me mpaabɔ kwan."

column2: "Ɔdze abo a woetwa ato m’atsempɔn mu fasu
column3: ɔakyeakyea m’akwan."

column2: "Ɔayɛ dɛ osisi a ɔretsɛw me
column3: dɛ ogyata a ɔhyɛ nsumaa mu."

column2: "Ɔadan m’akwan akɔ nkyɛn
column3: na ɔatsetsew mo mu esinesin; ɔama mayɛ pasaa."

column2: "Ɔakontom n’egyen
column3: na ɔdze me esi hɔ dɛ botae ama egyen menaba."

column2: "Ɔama n’egyen kotoku mu egyen menaba ahɛn me nsɛbɛ mu."
"Madan ɔsesɛba ama me man nyina; na hɔn atwetwesi ndwom adzekyee nyina."
"Ɔdze wenwen ahyɛ me ma
column3: ɔama bɔwen afon me."

column2: "Eso ɔdze mbosaabo ebubu me se
column3: ɔdze nso akata mo do."

column2: "Na ɔwo eyi me kra efi asomdwee ho kɔ ekyirekyir; mo werɛ fir prɔmprɔmyɛ."
"Na mesee dɛ
column3: M’enyimnyam asa
column4: na dza m’enyi da kwan wɔ EWURADZE hɔ no."

column2: "Mekaa m’amandzehu na m’awerɛhow a
column3: ɔyɛ ɔbɔwen na ɔbɔwema ma me."

column2: "Me kra da ho ara kaa
column3: na ɔabrɛ adze wɔ mo mu."

column2: "Naaso iyi na mekaakaa mo ho wɔ ho
column3: dɛm ntsi na mowɔ enyidado yi."

column2: "EWURADZE no dɔ a otsim ntsi na yɛnnhyewee yi
column3: na n’ehumbɔbɔr no tun nntwa da."

column2: "Wɔyɛ fofor anapa biara; wo nokwardzi so."
"EWURADZE nye me kyɛfa
column3: me kra na ɔse; dɛm ntsi m’enyi da no do."

column2: "EWURADZE ye dze ma hɔn a wɔtweɔn no no
column3: dze ma ɔkra a ɔhwehwɛ n’ekyir kwan no."

column2: "Oye ma ɔdasanyi dɛ n’enyi bɛda do na ɔayɛ komm atweɔn EWURADZE no nkwagye."
"Oye ma ɔdasanyi dɛ ɔsoa no kɔndua wɔ ne mbofrabermu."
"Sɛ EWURADZE dze to no do a
column3: ma no nko ntsena hɔ na ɔnyɛ komm."

column2: "Ma ɔmfa n’ano mbutuw huntuma mu; sɛ bi a enyidado bi bɛba a."
"Ma ɔmfa n’afon mma nyia ɔbɔ mu no; ma ahorba nhyɛ no ma tɔ."
"Na EWURADZE nnkɔtow akyen ara afebɔɔ."
"Na kaansa ɔhyɛ awerɛhow mpo a
column3: ne yamu bɛhyehye no wɔ no mbɔbɔrhu dodow ntsi."

column2: "Na ɔnnyɛ ne pɛ dɛ obehiahia ho ɔpɛdo
column3: eso dɛ obeyi adasamba awerɛhow."

column2: "Sɛ wɔdwerew asaase do adaduafo nyina wɔ ananadze
column4: "sɛ wɔdan ɔdasanyi ne ndzinoa to nkyɛn wɔ Ɔsorsornyi no enyim

column2: "Woana na ɔka ma ɔba mu
column3: ber a EWURADZE nnhyɛe no?"

column2: "Ana nnyɛ Ɔsorsornyi no n’anomu na mbusu na siar fir ba?"
"Ɔyɛ dɛn ntsi na nyimpa tseasenyi nhwinhwin
column3: wɔ no bɔn ho ntsea ho?"

column2: "Wɔmma yɛnhwehwɛ hɛn akwan mu na yɛmpa mu
column3: na yɛnsan nkɔ EWURADZE hɔ."

column2: "Wɔmma yɛmmema hɛn akoma ɔnye hɛn nsa do mma Nyankopɔn wɔ sorsor."
"Hɛn na yɛato mbra na yɛatsew etua; na ɔwo emmfae nnkyɛe."
"Edze ebufuw akata woho na etsiw hɛn; ekuku a ennhu mbɔbɔr."
"Edze nsuwusiw akata woho
column3: amma hɛn mpaabɔ biara eennhwira mu."

column2: "Ɔwo ayɛ hɛn nwurabanwuraba na ntɔmpamu wɔ aman finimfin."
"Hɛn atamfo nyinara ahanhan hɔn anomu petopetoo wɔ hɛn do."
"Suro na mona abɛda hɛn do
column3: amamfo na ɔsɛɛ."

column2: "M’enyiwa kyi nyinsuwa esutsen gu famu
column3: wɔ me man ne babaa ne sɛɛe ntsi."

column2: "M’enyiwa wora nsu gu famu
column3: na onngyaa
column6: "ekodu dɛ EWURADZE bɔbɔ ne tsir adze na oefi ɔsor ahwɛ."

column2: "M’enyiwa hyɛ me awerɛhow
column3: wɔ mo kurow ne mbabaa nyinara ntsi."

column2: "Hɔn a wɔyɛ m’atamfo kwa no
column3: woetsiw me dɛ anoma."

column2: "Woetwa mo nkwa do wɔ mona efiadze no mu
column3: na woesun ɔbo ato mo do."

column2: "Esu no praam me tsir do; mesee dɛ
column3: Woetwa me akyen."

column2: "Ao EWURADZE
column3: mifi mona no n’ase noho noho na mobɔɔ wo dzin."

column2: "Ɔwo itsiee me ndze
column3: mma nnsiw w’aso wɔ me nkrumsi do

column2: "Ɔwo twee pinii wɔ da a mefrɛɛ wo no: na esee dɛ
column3: Mma nnsuro."

column2: "EWURADZE
column3: ɔwo edzi me kra n’asɛm ama no; ɔwo apon me kra."

column2: "EWURADZE
column3: ɔwoara ehu mfom a wɔdze afom me; bua m’atsɛn ma me."

column2: "Ɔwo ehu hɔn enyitan nyina
column3: na hɔn tsirmpɔw nyina a wɔbɔ wɔ mo ho no."

column2: "EWURADZE
column3: ɔwoara atse hɔn ahorba
column4: na hɔn tsirmpɔw nyina a wɔdze tsia me no."

column2: "Hɔn a wɔtaa mo do no hɔn huhuhuhu na ehwinhwin
column3: soɛr tsia me adzekyee nyina."

column2: "Hwɛ
column3: hɔn asetsena na hɔn soɛr; emi nye hɔn atwetwesi ndwom."

column2: "EWURADZE
column3: ɔwoara ma hɔn ahyɛnanmu akatua
column4: dɛ mbrɛ hɔn nsaano edwuma tse."

column2: "Ma hɔn akoma atseetsee
column3: ma wo mpaamba nka hɔn."

column2: "Tsiw hɔn ebufuw mu
column3: na sɛɛ hɔn fi EWURADZE no sorsor no ase."
